sense.def:
To be starving
pomeni trpeti hudo pomanjkanje hrane, ki mu najverjetneje sledi smrt.

seg.quote: People are starving because of inefficient farming methods.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To starve someone
pomeni nekomu ne dati hrane.

seg.quote: You should starve him for twelve hours.
Ten men starved themselves to death in prison last year.

sense.def:
I am starving
rečemo, kadar smo zelo lačni;

seg.quote: I've got to have something to eat. I'm starving.

sense.def:
To be starved of something one needs
pomeni trpeti, ker ne dobimo dovolj tistega, kar potrebujemo.

seg.quote: They seem to be starved of attention from adults.
The plant was starved of light and died.
